name: The City: Superhero Flying Experience
description:
The City: Superhero Flying Experience is a sandbox simulator that aims to capture the feeling of superhero flight in a crowded city.

Gameplay

Fly and explore the crowded city in The City: Superhero Flying Experience.

When you first get into the game

Choose your map. Big box = big map. Small box = small map.

Controls

Press "M" to open configuration options.

Press "F" to activate flight mode. Note: You can set the fly speed to your liking.
Press "1", "2" to cycle between flight poses.

Have fun.
